title: Deploy demo apps to Amplify Gen2

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text:
Deploy both demo apps to Amplify Gen2. Configure each app with the Korporus App Runner URL as an environment variable or build-time config.

- `apps/demo-react` → deployed to its own Amplify app.
- `apps/demo-angular` → deployed to its own Amplify app.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Both demo apps are accessible at their Amplify URLs.
- Each demo app loads the Hello app's federated modules from the App Runner container.
- The full flow works: Amplify serves the SPA → browser loads remote modules from App Runner → Hello app renders.

### Dependencies
- Task 5.2 (needs the App Runner URL)
